data.title: Are mohit shegal and sharad malhotra brothers?
data.meta_description: Answers is the place to go to get the answers you need and to ask the questions you want
data.text:
What actors and actresses appeared in Andaaz - 2003?

The cast of Andaaz - 2003 includes: Maya Alagh as Mrs. Malti Singhania Baby Alisha as Young Kajal Kunika as Engagement Party Guest Beena Banerjee as Mrs. Beena Sahay Priyanka Chopra as Jiya Singhania Gajendra Chouhan as Mr. Sahay Pankaj Dheer as Professor Rohit Malhotra Lara Dutta as Kajal Singhania Supriya Karnik as Engagement Party Guest Akshay Kumar as Raj Malhotra Master Mohit as Young Raj Malhotra Navni Parihar as Mrs. Kiran Malhotra Kushal Punjabi as Monty Ghanshyam Rohera as Ram Singh Vivek Shaq as Raunaq Manduip Singh as Friend Brijesh Tiwari as Award Presenter Aman Verma as Karan Singhania Rajeev Verma as Mr. Eeshwar Singhaniya

What actors and actresses appeared in Souten - 1983?

The cast of Souten - 1983 includes: Vijay Arora as Vijay Pran as Raisaheb Prannath Pasha Shashikala as Renu Prannath Pasha Prem Chopra as Sampatlal Sudhir Dalvi as Prosecuting Lawyer Satyendra Kapoor Rajesh Khanna as Shyam Mohit Padmini Kolhapure as Radha Roopesh Kumar as Bingo (Photographer) Shreeram Lagoo as Gopal Tina Munim as Rukmani Mohit (Ruku) Yunus Parvez as Defending Lawyer Paresh Rawal as Mr. Jain
